publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2790.1 Robin Harper: GDP’s Inadequacy as a Measure of Sustainable Economic Growth—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2790) in the name of Bill Wilson, leave out from first "sustainable" to "growth and" and insert "environmentally-sustainable economic growth; welcomes the Scottish Government’s commitment to a more successful country; further welcomes". Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S3M-2790.1 Robin Harper: GDP’s Inadequacy as a Measure of Sustainable Economic Growth—As an amendment to motion (S3M-2790) in the name of Bill Wilson, leave out from first "sustainable" to "growth and" and insert "environmentally-sustainable economic growth; welcomes the Scottish Government’s commitment to a more successful country; further welcomes".
